svg.text: SAGA PRYOR DATA CENTER - ELECTRICAL SINGLE LINE DIAGRAM
13.8kV Dual Ring Bus Distribution | Tier III Architecture
From Basis of Design: 7BOD - Electrical (CSI Div 26)
1. Dual ring topology provides N path redundancy
2. N+1 redundancy for generators, transformers, and UPS
3. RMUs enable automatic SCADA-controlled ring reconfiguration
